title: Working up reputation to be able to make topics question?
body: How do I work up reputation to be able to make topics in other message boards? Thank you!

replies.body:
It depends on which sub-board you want to post on. Different sub-boards have different requirements for posting, so you'll have to refer to the sub-board's posting requirements to determine which level you need to be. As for your Boards level, this is based on your Summoner level, so you have to player more matches in order to level up.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
